Posts.Content: Hi, I'm new to the forum. dx with bc in Sept. 2005, LCIS, DCIS, Her2neg, ERPR+, intramammary lymph node involvement with possible two more. Doctors recommend mastectomy, chemo and radiation which I refuse to allow poison injected into my system and destruction of my immune system when it needs to be functioning at its best. I was wondering if anyone has been treated successfully with the laser treatment at LASE MED, Inc. (hope that's okay to mention names but I believe it is the only place that uses the technology and only ones that have a patent). The treatment is FDA approved and I have spoken to two of their patients who are happy with the results and have not experienced any side effects. Would like to get additional testimonies before trying myself. Thanks!
Posts.Signature: Our care should not be to have lived long as to have lived enough.
Posts.Title: Nanotech-laser for cancer treatment
